PerfectNetExp.abs: that is a surprising move , because it opens up the possibility that any site which finds itself blocked could that its content is , contextually , artistic-and so get a ban reversed .这一举措颇出人意料。因为这个先例，使得其他网站都有可能称他们被封禁的内容在某种情境下，是艺术行为，而导致封禁解除。
